resources.string: Welcome to Doffar University english learning app.

Apps features:

 1. In welcome page you can select any type of lesson and can also take quiz by selecting take quiz button. 2. There are 3 types of categories - Grammar, vocabulary, comprehension.
 4. You can select any category lesson and take the lesson. In this way you are preparing yourself for the quiz.
 5. Audio pronunciation of each lesson is available you just have to select the icon on top of each lesson and if you do not want to listen to it you can stop it any time by clicking the stop icon.
 6. There are three types of quizes for different users (basic -> intermediate -> advance)
 7. Basic and intermediate have 35 questions and advance test has 40 questions.
 8. At the end of quiz app will show you the result of your test. You can also analyze
 your performance by noticing the badge - which will show you whether your question is right or wrong.
 10. Each login session should have different questions so do not worry keep practicing.
This app is created by @Ahmed Abdullah Ahmed Al-Ojaili\n
